Ein Parcours durch<br>die Arenenberger V:
A journey through the
diversity of Arenenberg
Die Inhalte werden geladen. Dies dauert: Content is loading. This will take a moment.
Ein Kurzfilm und vier Hörreportagen mit: A short film and four audio reports with Annette Fetscherin and Arenenberg experts provide insights into the site’s diverse past and present. You can visit the station points located throughout the entire site in any order. And there’s always a game waiting for visitors of all ages to play. If you have any questions, please speak to shop staff.
Erfahren Sie von den Anfängen des Arenen: Learn about Arenenberg’s beginnings as a country estate and vineyard and how it developed into a place of culture, education and consulting after being donated to the Canton of Thurgau.
Hören Sie, welche Technologien die Arene: Hear about the technologies that make Arenenberg dairy farming pioneering. Annette Fetscherin talks to operations manager Hansjörg Hauser and headteacher Michael Schwarzenberger.
Vernehmen Sie, welche Innovationen am Ar: Find out what innovations are being developed at Arenenberg for productive and sustainable crop cultivation. Annette Fetscherin in conversation with consulters Carol Tanner and Marlis Nölly.
Erfahren Sie Wissenswertes über die Ents: Learn interesting facts about the origin and importance of the Arenenberg landscape park. Annette Fetscherin interviews museum director Dominik Gügel and landscape gardener Daniel Brogle.
Bringen Sie in Erfahrung, wie die franzö: Find out how the French Imperial family made their home at Arenenberg and how they have shaped the area around Untersee lake right up to the present day. Museum employee Christina Egli shares information with Annette Fetscherin.
